website_summaries.verdict: These low odor markers have an indicator on the side so you can keep track of how much ink remains in them.
pros: Chisel tips for broad or fine lines
Made from smooth writing liquid ink
Package contains a dozen assorted color markers
Ink indicators on sides so you can tell how much ink remains
cons: Not as clear on glass as on dry erase boards
Some buyers felt that these markers did not last long before going dry

customer_reviews.title: They leak.
customer_reviews.text: I started using these right away on my dry erase board on my wall. What I didn't realized was the marker was dripping on my carpet once I stopped writing and had walked across the room leaving a trail of orange ink on my light carpet. The stain did not come out all of the way and now I am too nervous to use any other colors. The marker is filled with liquid that you can see moving around inside, these are not like the usual felt type. I might have just been shipped a bad batch however I will be throwing these away.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Of  3

customer_reviews.title: Work well - 6 months daily us3-5 hours a day constant use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when the "leading" brand kept drying out. At first I was like "these are good" but are they GREAT! I teach and write for 3-5 hours 7 days a week and 3 weeks later they are as fresh as they were when I opened them. I go between 2 pens and neither is empty after 7 months teaching for 4-10 hours a day 7 days a week! Great for SayABC, VIPKid, GoGoKid, iTutor, Online ESL teachers All the colors can be seen, and used! Okay I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: laq

customer_reviews.title: Bold, Magical, and Easy Erase
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on dry erase markers before settling on this brand. And as silly as it may seem, because of it, I feel like I made a great choice! These markers write amazingly well, the colours are exactly as the marker depicts, you can see the writing from many feet away, and they wipe right off when you're ready to erase. If you're questioning which brand of dry erase markers to get, I highly recommend these. They definitely blow Expo out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Marker leaked all over within minutes! :-(
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these to use in my classroom because of the variety of colors in the package. Today was the first day I used them, and within minutes I had pink/red ink running down my hand. I was happy when I realized it wasn't blood, but not happy that minutes after opening the package, the first marker I used leaked all over me. Later in the day I tried the green one, which didn't leak on me, but it definitely wasn't as bold and bright as it should have been, being that I just made the purchase. Needless to say, I don't plan to purchase more. :-(
customer_reviews.author: tarafarah7: Tara Brown

customer_reviews.title: Erases very easy - Middle School Math students loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money to have clean white boards. ( I tried Expo for years ) I tried Expo markers and the residue was not clean. Students would erase their boards and be left with streaks of red, blue, green, etc. Student's would leave class with marker on their hands, because they used their hands to clear the board. (I will only use BIC for now on) Erases very easy, little to no residue. Students leave class with clean hands and boards are clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Rich color
customer_reviews.text: The best dry erase markers I have bought. The color are much darker then other brands even the orange and green which tend to be too light with other brands. I loves these and I would buy again if I needed too.
customer_reviews.author: Sbook

customer_reviews.title: Expo who?
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite whiteboard markers! You can see how much ink is left in them, they last for ages, the colors are vibrant, and they're easy to write with. These make Expo look like a subpar generic brand when it comes to whiteboard markers. Both pictures I've included came towards the end of the school year, and the markers were still holding up (even if my handwriting wasn't!). Just be careful if you're using multiple colors at once, I accidentally messed up my orange markers because I put black caps on them :(
customer_reviews.author: MissShelbyAnn

customer_reviews.title: These are the best dry erase markers
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dry erase markers. I love that you can see how much is left and they are so vivid in color.
customer_reviews.author: cfreeze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these dry erase markers more than Expo. They have bolder, richer colors.
customer_reviews.author: CVM

customer_reviews.title: Same old markers
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as "Intensity Advanced" - supposedly different from their old markers - but there is nothing different between this product and the old product. In fact, that's exactly what you get when you order the "Intensity Advanced" markers - you get the old product - in the old packaging that looks nothing like the Amazon picture - without any claims on the packaging of "intensity" or "advanced". Maybe a new version is coming out that looks like the product shown on the product page, but that's not what is shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Aljay

customer_reviews.title: Good. Easy to erase. Not sure about longevity
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied so far. I Iike that I can see the amount of ink in the marker. Both sides of the marker identifies the color. Expo leaves ink outlines on my board. These markers erase more cleanly. Not as intense color as Expo but not a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best dry erase markers I have ever used! Last longer than the other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Not really BOLD AS ADVERTISED.  Standard imo
customer_reviews.text: They seem pretty faint on glass boards. Maybe they are more BOLD on whiteboards? I was not impressed with the boldness. I have some older expo markers that were brighter and they are ten yrs old. They are just plain dry erase markers imo. Not bold by no means.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Trish

customer_reviews.title: BIC should stick to razors
customer_reviews.text: The "chisel" tips on these are not chisels, they are just tapered. You want to be able to write using either a fine tip (different style) or one of the 4 edges of the marker tip. The taper on these make you more likely to make contact with a large portion of the tip, and the result is a smudgy mess. Unless you're writing letters that are 3+ inches in height, you're not going to enjoy using this markers. Get either a fine tip or a standard tip. These chisels are worse in every way than both normal styles.
customer_reviews.author: Kelliar

customer_reviews.title: Dried up within 1-2 days of use
customer_reviews.text: I got these mainly because they were a good price for 12 markers and I liked the idea of knowing how much ink is left )I'm giving an extra star for this feature). Unfortunately they proved to not be a good investment because the tips dried up almost immediately - after less than 1-2 days of use. I didn't leave the lids of or anything - they just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Great markers
customer_reviews.text: Colors are vibrant and so not bleed. So far I have not had any staining, even with leaving the writing on a board for over a week. Also, the odor is almost non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: K8lin DB

customer_reviews.title: Meh :-/
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I like to write little inspirations on my mirrors here and there, and I wanted to be able to see them vibrantly. These Bic ‘Intensity’ dry erase markers are no more intense than the basic dry-Expo pen-sized ones. They’re fine and they work the way dry-erase markers should, but they’re no more than that.
customer_reviews.author: sf

customer_reviews.title: I like this brand of dry erase markers
customer_reviews.text: Better than expo. Liquid does not last so long but longer than expo. I buy these in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good markers overall
customer_reviews.text: A couple of colors don't work well on a glass whiteboard, but most get the job done, so I would recommend buying, especially if you burn through a lot of the basic colors.
customer_reviews.author: DC James

customer_reviews.title: Tied for best
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT dry erase markers. When they say bold, they mean it. I use them for class, and they show up great. The window showing you how much ink is left is key. The only thing I don't like, is that they are not refillable- the other dry erase markers that are tied with these are refillable, but more limited in color choice.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The color is vibrant and it doesn’t leave imprints after erases. I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: misty denney

customer_reviews.title: Bright, colorful dry erase markers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these dry erase markers. They are much more vivid in color than the ones I am used to using and over all work really well. Would definitely recommend for someone looking for lots of colors!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expo brand
customer_reviews.text: These are way better than Expo brand. I have a Quartet brand board that is not completely smooth in which I use on a daily basis. The colors that normally stain a board completely erase. There is a fluid indicator which is a plus. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: binkygrl75369

customer_reviews.title: Bright, clear colors
customer_reviews.text: This brand of dry erase marker is my favorite, and I've tried many. I like the many color options available. All are readable and long lasting, even on the crappy glass board in the classroom I used to teach in. Definitely recommend for any professional or teacher who does a lot of white-boarding.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I had some other Staples brand markers but you could hardly see them on my board and I wanted vibrant colors for color-coding purposes. These work great and are so bright and easy to read!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expo
customer_reviews.text: I bought cheese based on refugees and I am glad I did. I have been using the same three markers for three entire months now in my classroom and they still have ink. If you see the side of the poem, it has a window to show the amount of ink in it that then feeds to the felt tip. These last so much longer than Expos. The color is vibrant as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: ONE HAPPY TEACHER. I LOVE THESE MARKERS!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE MY FAVORITE MARKERS. I’ve been using the “Expo” brand of markers for years, but bought these ones after I saw a college professor using carrying them around from class to class. They are LIFE CHANGING if you are a teacher! The colors are vivid, they write smoothly, AND THEY ERASE WITHOUT LEAVING SMUDGES. One of my biggest pet peeves is a dirty whiteboard and these have made things so much better! You won’t regret buying them!
customer_reviews.author: McKaylie

customer_reviews.title: Great marker
customer_reviews.text: Bright, colorful and write very smoothly. Dires quickly and erases easily. I love the ink level indicator on the side too.
customer_reviews.author: dldesch

customer_reviews.title: Write BIG and BOLD !
customer_reviews.text: Markers are wonderful to use. Big, BOLD and easy to write with. Colors are impressive. Definitely a reorder item...
customer_reviews.author: Rick Z.

customer_reviews.text: They work great and all the colors are vibrant. Its not hard to wipe off and they leave no stain.
customer_reviews.author: fsdgsdfgsh

customer_reviews.title: Great for the classroom
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and go through many, many dry erase markers. These work great from the get go, are very affordable and offer a nice selection of colors. Will definitely our hase again.
customer_reviews.author: mamachilla

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant & Long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: Best whiteboard markers I’ve used. I’m a teacher and I write on my board daily. I love how vibrant these are!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ball

customer_reviews.title: Not good for glass boards
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on a glass board and they are not the best quality. 3 are completely dried out and don’t write at all. The rest are not bold or intense at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Young

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Bold
customer_reviews.text: Bright and bold colors that can easily be seen from across the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great markers
customer_reviews.text: We really like these markers. They have great color and write great.
customer_reviews.author: Hijinx79

customer_reviews.title: Nice markers... very good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are good markets at a great price. I bought them because I was unpleased with the ones that we have at the office. Everybody is happy with them... just hope they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: smartin

customer_reviews.title: Bright colored
customer_reviews.text: Vivid color makes them good for more than dry erase surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bold colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong competitor against the other brand. I will definitely re-purchase for I feel you get more for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Good markers
customer_reviews.text: These are very good liquid markers, they work great, but there easy to use up quickly if you use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter12

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Erase markers EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We love these markers, the colors are rich, the ink is juicy and the point doesn't wear down. We use daily in class, and they certainly take a beating, and keep on going. I especially love that you can see the ink level.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen R

customer_reviews.title: Way better than EXPO!
customer_reviews.text: These markers are the best I've ever used in my classroom! They last longer than EXPO and are more vivid in color. (Only the light green is useless.) When (if) these ever dry out, I'll repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: ZenDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like these because you can see the level of ink. Also, they really do work well, better than Expo.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Rich colors. Easy to erase. A bit pricey but I don’t use them all that often even as a teacher (chemistry). Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dantes

customer_reviews.title: Love these markers.
customer_reviews.text: These are bright and crisp on your white board, and they stay that way until they run out of ink.
customer_reviews.author: Alexalon9

customer_reviews.title: Your whiteboard won't stain!
customer_reviews.text: These are BY FAR the best dry erase markers I have ever used! Even the red marker erases with. your. fingers. Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Love the array of colors. Haven’t used them yet as the school year hasn’t started yet.
customer_reviews.author: munchabuncha

customer_reviews.title: Important
customer_reviews.text: It is serving the functionality for which I brought them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dry erase markers I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Great markers. Easy to write small or large. I also like how the ink is very bold versus other brands.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Good Colors, NOT Dried Out and Arrived Promptly
customer_reviews.text: Good colors and arrived promptly. None of the markers were dried out when we got them and they're continuing to function well.
customer_reviews.author: Lou250

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work but can no longer use colors so I use at home on whiteboard. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Marler

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kids dry board. Seem to be very good quality and haven't had any problems yet. Great value for this many markers.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Test markers first
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 boxes and we were testing out the markers and on the first box, 2 of the black markers leaked out and are unusable, the rest of the markers worked well. The second box, 1 brown marker leaked out as well and was also unusable, the other markers were fine. I tried to see if they would replace my items but it says they are unreturnable. I will be calling Amazon and letting them know.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Flores

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while ago and they are still going strong. I like the colors that come in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kenia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for school teachers
customer_reviews.text: I write a lot on the white board. The ink is very bold and dark. The ink goes quickly though. These markers will be a staple for me.
customer_reviews.author: pocket

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on a colored whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: My glass whiteboard is black. These markers do not show up at all. Cannot use them. Probably can't return since they're opened :(
customer_reviews.author: ElleD

customer_reviews.title: Great for teacher appreciation week!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my kids teachers for teacher appreciation week! Their teachers will love this! Arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am an educator and I have always used Expo markers, however I love these so much more. Better quality dry erase marker!
customer_reviews.author: Salena

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expo!
customer_reviews.text: They write with a much darker tint than Expo markers. Very satisfied with these!
customer_reviews.author: C. Pacan

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite EXPO
customer_reviews.text: They're not quite as brilliant as EXPO. I think they may be cheaper though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best white board markers for the classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with these white board markers! Love that they have an ink tank & you can see how much ink you have.
customer_reviews.author: Glo-pez

customer_reviews.title: Not an even distribution of colors
customer_reviews.text: Good quality in how they write and how bold the ink is. A little disappointed in color selection. I thought there would be a more even distribution. In my box there are: 4 red, 4 black, 4 dark blue, 3 green, 2 pink, 2 orange, 2 purple, 1 light blue, 1 lime green, 1 brown. I would have preferred more bold colors which is really what I was looking for when making the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Liu

customer_reviews.title: BIC is my favorite brand for dry erase markers
customer_reviews.text: BIC is my favorite brand for dry erase markers. They're always quality and have a great feel when writing with them. My only complaint is I wish there was a yellow color. The closest is either lime green or orange.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: No Complaints. The box has multiple blue, black, and red markers but still has a good assortment of other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Erase Markers
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dry erase markers out there. They are easy to erase off any kind of whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing and lasted a really long time! The color is dark and shows up great
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never go back.
customer_reviews.text: Being a school teacher, it’s all about the dry erase markers. These are, by far, my favorite. They last long, have a bold vibrant color, and write very smoothly. I would recommend and repurchase. I also like that you can see when the marker is getting close to running out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bold and not too light.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife because she uses a white board a lot while in grad school. They are much bolder than Expo, Sharpie, and Staples brands. Can't go wrong with a 24 count box when used heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: They are ok...
customer_reviews.text: These do write well and the colors are bold, they are hard to wipe off your board. It leaves little bits and pieces all over your white board. I have to use the expo spray every day. I will be sticking with Quartet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: They are good but do not last to long as far as the felt, it seems to flatten and write messy
customer_reviews.author: Anitra

customer_reviews.title: Missing one in the package
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it happened but there was a marker missing in the package.
customer_reviews.author: ANikki2326

customer_reviews.title: Worked like they should
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to see ink supply thru the clear barrel
customer_reviews.author: John D. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't great for Glass whiteboards
customer_reviews.text: They were great on regular dry erase boards, but the main one I use to write my daughter's schedule is on a glass white dry erase board. The color was faded on the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Chendara

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: These write so smooth and the ink is very strong and visible! Teacher approved!!

customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Very easy to erase, Even on today’s cheap crappy whiteboards.

customer_reviews.text: These pens/markers are much brighter and crisper then the usual brands.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dry erase markers I have found. I use them constantly in my classroom.

customer_reviews.text: excellent brand and the markers last longer and its darker than expo dry erase markers

customer_reviews.text: I like having the window to see when there is still ink remaining.

customer_reviews.text: These markers write beautifully, but they don't last very long.

customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST white board pens EVER!!!! I will use nothing else! Great bright vivid colors and they write easily and stay!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best dry erase markers I have used. Far better than Expo.

customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and the way it writes so far. No issues

customer_reviews.text: I love these markers for my daughters dry erase books.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the classroom
customer_reviews.text: These were a great value for the price. My students love the variety of colors.

customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while back and they still have a lot a life in them; love the tip

customer_reviews.title: Best dry erase markers available
customer_reviews.text: Best dry erase markers available. I've taught for over twenty years and these are the only markers I'll use.

customer_reviews.text: Fantastic markers! Vibrant colors! Better quality than other name brand markers.

customer_reviews.text: Nice markers but about 3 of them were dried out which is the downside. They do write great though
customer_reviews.author: Natasja

customer_reviews.title: ... on my arm and clothing but the others are good still!
customer_reviews.text: After two days one of the markers leaked on my arm and clothing but the others are good still!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Seems to have more ink than the standard Expo markers.

product_meta.title: BIC Intensity Dry Erase Marker, Tank Style, Chisel Tip, Assorted Colors, 12-Count
product_meta.description: Size:12 Count| Color:AssortedIdeal for home, School, or office use, BIC intensity advanced dry erase markers are ACMI-approved and feature bold, low-odor ink. With their liquid ink, these Tank-Style markers provide smooth, consistent ink flow on dry erase boards, glass, and most non-porous surfaces, and their marks erase easily. These non-toxic markers also offer a visible, long-lasting ink supply and come equipped with a chisel tip that lets you create broad and fine lines. This pack contains 12 dry erase markers in bright Assorted colors.
feature_bullets: Dry erase marker features liquid ink and offers low odor and bold writing
Erases easily and provide smooth, consistent ink flow
Chisel tip for broad and fine lines on dry erase boards, glass, and most non-porous surfaces
Long-lasting ink supply with visible ink level

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars454 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
